messages.message: Is there a way we can allow the model to return JSON? I don't think it does require subjective interpretation
Hi @Matt Weaver - how would you like to use that json response in the chat app? In the builder experience, we can integrate it with a downstream system.

I know that GPT can give me a json because asking it “extract the *information* in this document as a json” does work. It seems to be something to do with the inclusion of the word “summarise” at the start.

Additionally “extract the *data* in this document as a json” does not work.

Try these 3 prompts…
• extract the data in this document as a json
• Extract the information in this document as a json
• Summarise this document as a json
Can you share your doc as well?
